context.p: To configure Oxygen XML Editor/Author to run over the currently opened XML file, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: In Oxygen XML Editor/Author, select Tools External Tools Configure .

info.note: If you haven't configured the PATH environment variable to point to the installation directory, use the full path to the chemistry.cmd script. If the installation directory contains spaces, use quotes around the full path of the script.
